attributes.action: Resign his office sooner rather than later.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we believe that by hanging on in office until the middle of 2006, the Prime Minister is damaging the interests of Great Britain internationally. We call upon the Prime Minister to resign before the European Summit in June to stop Britain being represented by an (effectively) lame duck Prime Minister at that summit, in a vainglorious attempt to achieve a 'legacy'.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
